fulltext:
Nguyen The Phuong
IOS Developer
Date of birth:
 Aug 06, 1996
Gender:  Male
Phone:
 0969 345 159
Email:  nguyenthephuong2808@gmail.com
Address:
 District 2, HCM City, Vietnam
Website:  https://www.linkedin.com/in/thephuongcqt
OBJECTIVE
I am a iOS developer with young passion, I am very excited to discovery new technologies and architectures.
I read technology books and blogs to gain knowledge and become a senior iOS developer as soon as possible. My long-
term goal is becoming a solution architect.
EDUCATION
9/2014 - 9/2018
FPT University - Software Engineer
Key Major: Information system
GPA: 7.8/10
- Semester 1, 2: Honorable Student
- Semester 3: Honorable Student, Top 5 highest grade in the faculty of ICT
9/2011 - 5/2014
Quang Trung High School for the Gifted
Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science
WORK EXPERIENCE
10/2018 - Present
GNT Viet Nam
iOS developer
- Develop applications using swift and support other department about iOS
issues
- Develop iOS app project and start-up product of company which is
description more detail at below (section Projects)
3/2017 - 8/2017
Splus Software JSC (Internship)
Mobile developer internship
- Working on IOS projects: using Objective-C language 
- Working on cross platform projects: Hybrid application (Apache Cordova)
HONORS & AWARDS
2018
Third prize of the FPT University student research conference.
2014
Getting 50% scholarship of FPT University 
- 90/105 GMAT total score in entrance examination of FPT University.
2014
First prize of the provincial level excellent student contest in informatics.
2013
Silver medal in the Olympic competition 30-4 in informatics.
2013
Third prize of the provincial level excellent student contest in informatics.
Programming Languages &
Frameworks
- iOS development using Swift 
- RxSwift, RxCocoa
- Alamofire, Realm, Kingfisher, Swiftlint, Chart, etc
- Fastlane, Carthage, etc
- CoreLocation, GoogleMaps
- HealthKit
- Firebase Notification
- Firebase Real-time database, Firestore 
Other Programming Languages
I have a little bit knowledge about: Flutter and Cordova
Language English
Soft Skills
- Task and time management skills 
- Teamwork skills 
- Communication skills
SKILLS
PROJECTS
Farmi.vn App (E-commerce about fresh food)
(04/2019 - Present)
Customer
Farmi (subsidiary of GNT)
Description
Farmi is an online grocery shopping application, including two applications:
- Farmi app: for customer buy a fresh food
- Rabbit app: for delivery, manager, operator
- itunes link: https://apple.co/2p1xaSO
Team size
10 members
My position
iOS Developer
My responsibilities
- Optimize build time and fix some leak memory bugs
- Develop new features and new designs for end-user
- Develop new features to support for marketing team and delivery team
- Fix bugs
Technologies used
- MVVM with RxSwift
- Deeplink
- GraphQL
- Fastlane, Swiftlint
- Firebase Realtime database
- Firebase Notification
- GoogleMaps
- Xcode 10, Swift 4
Kenco Support Program (Healthcare app)
(10/2018 - 4-2019)
Customer
Daido Life Insurance Company
Kenco support program app is a healthcare application integrated with existed system of
Daido Life insurance company, this app help user can track health data and their insurance
program
Description
- This application tracks health data for user from their smartphone, apple watch, fitbit
smartwatch, pulsense smartwatch or google fit smartwatch
- User can change health tracking device anytime and easy to follow insurance program,
promotion program from Daido Life Insurance company
- itunes link: https://apple.co/2Za2ejh
Team size
9 Members
My position
iOS Developer
My responsibilities
- Key member in this project
- Meeting with my team to find the approaches and solutions for application, breakdown the
task and estimate time for them
- Draw sequence diagram for all logical flow of this subsystem
- Support leader about technical problems, follow task progress of development team and
raise issues
- Setup iOS project for 4 environments (DEV, TEST, STAG, PROD)
- Build the architecture for project based on MVC and mixed with a little bit RxSwift
- Build Network layer based on Alamofire, Database Layer based on Realm
- Setup fastlane, swiftlint
- Fix bugs
- Support other members in technical and fix ugently bugs for them
Technologies used
- Xcode 10, Swift 4
- RxSwift, RxRealm
- Firebase Notification
- OAuth2
- Fastlane
Call-Center on Mobile for Clinic
(5/2018 - 8/2018)
Customer
FPT University (Capstone project for graduation)
Description
- This is an automation system which allows patient call to clinic to book appointment.
- The system analyzes patient information from speech to text, then arranges appointment.
- Last step is answer to patient about appointment information by translate text to speech.
- More over, our system supports clinic to manage patient information, medical record. We
also simulate how to integrate other system to our system.
Team size
4 members for 4 months
My position
Team Leader/Developer
My responsibilities
- Analyst and design system
- Find the approaches and solutions for project
- Research new technologies 
- Draw sequence diagram, activity diagram, component diagram, class diagram, etc
- Manage tasks and report to supervisor
- Review code for other member
- Develop and fix bug
Technologies used
- Google speech to text service
- FPT text to speech service
- Paypal/braintree
- Twilio
- Firebase Notification
- Real-time database (Cloud Firestore)
- Node JS, Android, Angular, MySQL
INTERESTS
- Exploring New Technologies 
- Reading blog from meadium, Raywenderlich, freecodecamp, etc
- Playing sports: football, chess 
- Listening to music
- Internet surfing
PERSONALITY
- Fast learning
- Sense of responsibility and carefulness
- Flexible, logical
- Strong thirst to knowledge, hard-working
- Gracious, friendly, swift and articulate
REFERENCES
Kiều Trọng Khánh
Master of Engineer in Computer Science - Supervisor of my capstone project 
FPT University - HCM Campus
Email: khanhkt@fe.edu.vn
Mobile: 090 8133304
